word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重双方静止地面对面，或指指充满勇气、信心和决心正视人或事。
通常指遇到困难或挫折，也指偶然或意外地相遇。
普通用词，本义指双方或多方从不同方向或相反方向作向对运动，最终相碰(遇)。
多指通过书信、电话或直接会面和别人联系。口语用词。
不可避免的，面对面的相遇。也指敢于正视困难或问题的决心和信心。
指具体意义“接触”时，强调动作；表抽象意义时，侧重“联系”。
强调紧密接触的两个物体之间的相互关系。也可用作比喻。

bilingual.source: The policeman will contact the patrol cars.

bilingual.target: 如有任何建议，请联系我们。

bilingual.source: If you find any quality issues, please contact Fenghuang Media.
bilingual.target: 如发现印装质量问题，请与凤凰传媒联系。

bilingual.source: We need your contact number to contact you.
bilingual.target: 我们需要您的联系电话以便联系您。

bilingual.source: We should keep in touch often and not lose contact.
bilingual.target: 我们应该经常保持联系，不要失去联系。

list.abstract: 这是一款风格清新的RPG，故事讲述的是一个名叫切利的男孩无意中卷入了一场博士与神秘人的战斗中，在一个陌生的星球展开冒险。本作是第一款对应 Wi-Fi 的RPG， 与朋友Wi-Fi 联机后可开启新的舞台以及获得新道具。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you in contact with your brother?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你和你哥哥还有联系吗？

yingyinNormal.en: OK, and is there any way you could contact them?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你有办法可以联系到他们吗？

yingyinNormal.en: How? Has anyone been in contact with Helen Cho?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如何进化？有人联系过赵海伦吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Did you keep in contact? Christmas cards and such.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们还保持联系了吗？圣诞贺卡什么的。

yingyinNormal.en: How did they contact you, the leaders of Silk Road? Through e-mail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们怎么联系你的，丝路的高层？发邮件联系。

yingyinNormal.en: Let me deal with that. Just get me his contact info.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个我来搞定，给我他的联系电话就行。

yingyinNormal.en: It's how you stay in contact with me and the command center.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们就靠它与我和指挥中心保持联系。

yingyinNormal.en: Get me his contact info. It won't make a difference calling him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 给我他的联系电话。打给他不能改变什么的。

yingyinNormal.en: And you had no contact with Medivh since? Not for the lack of trying.
yingyinNormal.zh: 自那之后就没再联系上麦迪文了？试过很多次了。

yingyinNormal.en: Your father got in contact this week. Does the name Sean Casey mean anything to you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们是这周联系到你父亲的你知道肖恩·凯西么？

yingyinNormal.en: Perhaps I can contact you, possibly through my poetry falcon. Poetry falcon. I like that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许我可以透过我的诗鹰联系你。诗鹰，我喜欢。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. I'm gonna contact him. Don't call Maggie again, Bob. I know your number.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，我会联系他的，别再打给玛姬了，鲍勃，我知道你的号码。

yingyinNormal.en: Ah, Amy, this walkie-talkie is yours. If we run into any problems, I'll contact you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，艾米，这是你的对讲机，如果我们遇到问题，我就联系你。

yingyinNormal.en: In case of emergency, please contact, Amy Farrah Fowler. And there's my phone number.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦发生紧急情况，请与艾米·菲拉·福勒联系，还有我的电话号码。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you blame him? I don't blame... I don't think about him. Has he attempted to make contact with you? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你责备他吗？我不责备……我不去想他。他有尝试过和你联系吗？没有。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know. And I wish that I did, but there's no way for me to contact my operatives inside the Capitol.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不知道，但我希望能尽快找到他，但我暂时没法联系上我们打入国会区的内线。

yingyinNormal.en: In the meantime, the president is reaching out to Governor Conway should contact with the captors be established.
yingyinNormal.zh: 同时，总统正在寻求康威州长的支援，为一旦与劫持者建立了联系作准备。

yingyinNormal.en: She has no family. She has no friends. You're her only contact. And I'm told you don't visit her. No, I don't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她没有家人。也没有朋友。你是她唯一的联系人。我听说你从不来看她。没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Tell me, do you know, was it a condition of his bail that he not contact any of the witnesses? It was. Thank you, Detective.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是否清楚，他保释的条件之一就是不与任何证人联系？是的。谢谢你，警探。

yingyinNormal.en: And then when we get back to New York, we need to contact, Leslie to see what she can do to minimize the press on all this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等我们回纽约了，联系一下蕾丝丽，看她能不能，想办法把这件事的影响减到最小。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Eye <highlight>contact</highlight> can be a friendly social signal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 眼神接触可以是友好的社交信号。

examination_example.sentence: In a social situation, eye <highlight>contact</highlight> with another person can show that you are paying attention in a friendly way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在社交场合，与他人的眼神接触可以表明你在以友好的方式关注他人。

examination_example.sentence: In them we can see biophilia — a yearning for <highlight>contact</highlight> with nonhuman life — assuming uncanny representational forms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在它们身上，我们可以看到人类热爱的自然天性--对和非人类生命接触的向往--呈现出各种奇特的表现形式。

sense_info_list.en: the state or condition of communicating or meeting

examination_example.sentence: However, the Justices said that Arizona police would be allowed to verify the legal status of people who come in <highlight>contact</highlight> with law enforcement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，大法官们表示，亚利桑那州的警察将被允许核查与执法人员联络接触的人的合法身份。

sense_info_list.en: one who may be communicated with for information or assistance, especially regarding one's job

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the state or condition of physical touching

examination_example.sentence: Unfortunately, activities involving direct <highlight>contact</highlight> with people, which contributed to better wellbeing were found to be on the decline.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不幸的是，涉及与人直接接触的活动，更有助于发现幸福感是在下降。

sense_info_list.en: the state or condition of communicating or meeting

examination_example.sentence: A large proportion of the species is in continuous <highlight>contact</highlight> with technology that can record key features of an individual's behavior and environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很大一部分物种与可以记录个人行为和环境关键特征的技术持续接触。

sense_info_list.en: one who may be communicated with for information or assistance, especially regarding one's job

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the state or condition of communicating or meeting

examination_example.sentence: A restaurant named in Newcastle <highlight>contacted</highlight> Joe's teacher to ask if the 9-year-old could come and decorate its dining-room with his drawings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 纽卡斯尔的一家餐馆联系了乔的老师，询问这个9岁的孩子是否可以来用他的画装饰餐厅。

examination_example.sentence: After <highlight>contacting</highlight> the chocolate manufacturer, the firefighters resorted to spraying hot, pressurized water to get rid of the sticky substance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在联系巧克力制造商后，消防队员们采取了喷射热水、加压水的方法来去除粘性物质。

examination_example.sentence: It was difficult to <highlight>contact</highlight> the manufacturer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很难联系到制造商。

sense_info_list.en: the state or condition of physical touching

examination_example.sentence: In nonverbal communication terminology (术语) , physical <highlight>contact</highlight> and the study of touching are generally referred to as haptics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在非语言交流术语中(术语)，身体接触和对触摸的研究统称为触觉学。

examination_example.sentence: Physical <highlight>contact</highlight> between unfamiliar people is negatively perceived.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不熟悉的人之间的身体接触被认为是消极的。

examination_example.sentence: The simple answer is to thoroughly learn unique cultural norms for physical <highlight>contact</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简单的答案就是全面学习身体接触的独特文化规范。

sense_info_list.en: one who may be communicated with for information or assistance; especially regarding one's job

数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: If selected, you will be <highlight>contacted</highlight> by a manager.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果被选中，将有一名经理与你联系。

examination_example.sentence: For more information, <highlight>contact</highlight> Charles Chen at cchen@famd.com.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 若了解更多信息，请联系Charles Chen，cchen@famd.com。

sense_info_list.zh: 联系; 联络; 交往

examination_example.sentence: Andria's project to bring artists into direct <highlight>contact</highlight> with children is welcome at a time when the arts are being downgraded in schools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当艺术在学校被降级的时候，Andria让艺术家与儿童直接接触的项目很受欢迎。

examination_example.sentence: I found the <highlight>contact</highlight> information of the company and emailed its president.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我找到了该公司的联系信息，并给其总裁发了电子邮件。

examination_example.sentence: Taking on this challenge will bring you in <highlight>contact</highlight> with someone who shares your interests.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 接受这一挑战将使你接触到与你兴趣相同的人。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 联系; 联络; 交往

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 直接联系；直接接触；直接联络

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Contact</highlight> tracing apps are mainly used on smartphones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 接触者追踪应用程序主要用于智能手机。

examination_example.sentence: That's why many people hope that digital <highlight>contact</highlight> tracing with smartphones will help.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就是为什么许多人希望使用智能手机进行数字联系人追踪会有所帮助的原因。

examination_example.sentence: It didn’t have direct <highlight>contact</highlight> with tears.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它没有直接接触眼泪。

sense_info_list.zh: 联系; 联络; 交往

examination_example.sentence: For more information, you can <highlight>contact</highlight> us by e-mail.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 欲知详情，请通过电子邮件联系我们。

examination_example.sentence: Don’t share your friends’ <highlight>contact</highlight> info with someone unknown to them before they agree.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在朋友同意之前，不要与他们不认识的人分享您朋友的联系信息。

examination_example.sentence: But Japanese, African, and many Latin American cultures avoid eye <highlight>contact</highlight> to show respect.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但日本、非洲和许多拉丁美洲文化为了表达尊重而避免眼神交流。

examination_example.sentence: Earlier, a California company developed another kind of <highlight>contact</highlight> lens using LED technology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 早些时候，一家加利福尼亚公司使用 LED 技术开发了另一种隐形眼镜。

examination_example.sentence: The best title of this passage probably is <highlight>Contact</highlight> Lenses and Convenience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这篇文章最好的标题可能是隐形眼镜和便利。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>contact</highlight> lens is one of what they are researching on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 隐形眼镜是他们正在研究的产品之一。
